name: Penne Rigate With Basil
keywords: appetizer, main course, side dish, basil, pasta, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3/4 pound penne rigate or any large Italian tube pasta
1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring enough water for pasta to boil in a kettle or large saucepan. When it boils, add salt and the pasta. Bring to a boil again; cook, stirring, for about 10 minutes or according to package instructions. Do not overcook. Drain and reserve 1/4 cup of the cooking liquid.
Transfer the pasta to the kettle. Then, add the drained liquid along with the olive oil, nutmeg, butter, pepper flakes and salt and pepper to taste. Toss well, and sprinkle with the fresh basil.
